en:
Hey, listen, listen, @CharacterName!
Did you know?

Apparently, you can perform a long
jump right after you land a ground slam!

If you initiate a ground slam while already
ground slamming, you gain upward
momentum!

It's practically, a low budget double jump,
isn't it?
<w>Hahahaha!</w>

Honestly, it could be really useful for when
you need just a tiny bit more height!
